songs.title: We Are Who We Are
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Jade & Leigh-Anne]
Momma, momma, momma made me the way I am
My face, my eyes, someone turn me up, I'm speaking my mind
And I, and I, I've been wasting a lot of time
Looking in mirrors and hating on me, but now I like what I see

[Pre-Chorus: All & (Jesy)]
I know, I know (I'll never be perfect)
I know, I know (But I'm gonna work it)
Let go, let go
(Put your new shoes on, the new you on)

[Chorus: All]
We are who we are, who we are, pretty's just a pretty word
And I'm gonna shine like a star, cause I'm the only me in this world
Throw away the books and the magazines, I'm never gonna look like a beauty queen
We are who we are, who we are, and I'm just doing me, just doing me
And I'm just doing me, just doing me

[Verse 2: Jesy & Perrie]
Momma, momma, momma made me the way I am
She told me I should look upon the world with my head held high
And I, and I, I've been wasting a lot of time
Looking in mirrors and hating on me, but now I like what I see

[Pre-Chorus: All & (Jade)]
I know, I know (I'll never be perfect)
I know, I know (But I'm gonna work it)
Let go, let go
(Put your new shoes on, the new you on)

[Chorus]
We are who we are, who we are, pretty's just a pretty word
And I'm gonna shine like a star, cause I'm the only me in this world
Throw away the books and the magazines, I'm never gonna look like a beauty queen
We are who we are, who we are, and I'm just doing me, just doing me
And I'm just doing me, just doing me

[Pre-Chorus: All & (Jesy)]
I know, I know (I'll never be perfect)
I know, I know (But I'm gonna work it)
Let go, let go
(Put your new shoes on, the new you on)

[Chorus]
We are who we are, who we are, pretty's just a pretty word
And I'm gonna shine like a star, cause I'm the only me in this world
Throw away the books and the magazines, I'm never gonna look like a beauty queen
We are who we are, who we are, and I'm just doing me, just doing me
And I'm just doing me, just doing me

[Outro: All & (Perrie)]
And I'm just doing me, just doing me
And I'm just doing me, just doing me
(And I'm just doing me, just doing me
And I'm just doing me, just doing me)
